notes:
This dataset includes [OpenStreetMap](http://www.openstreetmap.org) extracts for places in Nepal.  The data is hosted on the [Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts](http://nepal.piensa.co/) website managed by [GeoFabrik](http://www.geofabrik.de/) and [GFDRR](http://www.gfdrr.org/).  

The placenames.* files include all city/hamlet/neighborhood/village/etc features in the OpenStreetMap database.  The cities, hamlets, and neighborhood files include subsets of the placename dataset, for:

- cities.* matches tags: [place=city](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:place%3Dcity),
- hamlets.* matches tags: [place=hamlet](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:place%3Dhamlet),
- neighborhoods.* matches tags: [place=neighborhood](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:place%3Dneighbourhood), [place=neighbourhood](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:place%3Dneighbourhood)

The data is updated every 30 minutes.

## Other OpenStreetMap extracts
### OSM layers / 30 minutes updates  from nepal.piensa.co   
Hosted on the [Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts](http://nepal.piensa.co/) website.  
### Roads
[Nepal OpenStreetMap Extracts, Roads](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/nepal-openstreetmap-extracts-roads) dataset on HDX.
### OpenStreetMap Daily / 30 minutes updates
Various formats including for small devices (GPS, phones, tablets) on  [2015 Nepal Earthquake](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/2015_Nepal_earthquake#Exporting_OpenStreetMap_data)

See the [2015 Nepal Earthquake](http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/2015_Nepal_earthquake) OSM wiki page for more information on the [Humanitarian OpenStreetMap Team](http://hotosm.org/) (or HOT) response.
